name: Shield
classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock (Hexblade), Artificer (Artillerist), Artificer (Battle Smith), Artificer (Artillerist), Artificer (Battle Smith), Artificer (Armorer (UA)), Artificer (Revisited) (UA) (Artillerist), Paladin (Redemption (UA)), Cleric (Forge (UA)), Warlock (Hexblade (UA))
text:
An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.
Source: Player's Handbook p. 275
